review.reviewBody:
Best breakfast ever thank you 
It's always good, never a miss and I am always a difficult order because of allergy's , always on point

The Brioche Breakfast Club tastes really good, but the shredded potatoes that comes as a side was undercooked for sure. It also had sour creme hidden within it with my extra bacon for some reason without warning. I would switch the side. The Kids' Super Smart Start was really good though.
If you get the Waffle Big Breakfast, dont be fooled, it doesnt  actually come with stuffed hasbrowns as said and shows in the photo. Still a good breakfast, just disappointing.

The waffle was too hard and I didn't get plum sauce for my chicken strips. There was no option for separating the breakfast so it wasn't all mushed together 
Next time I will dine in :)
They overloaded it with so much gravy everything was soggy.
